package.name: asr_lib_ism
package.description: This package integrates a library for scene recognition based on implicit shape models (ISM) to the ros environment.
package.author: Hanselmann Fabian, Heller Florian, Heizmann Heinrich, Kübler Marcel, Mehlhaus Jonas, Meißner Pascal, Qattan Mohamad, Reckling Reno, Stroh Daniel
